name: Buggy Update
description:
CONTROLS:

-Movement: WASD / Arrows

-Shoot: Left click

Hello world! This is the first game I ever upload for other people to see, as well as the submission for the first game jam I have ever done: Trijam #127. I know it isn't great by any means, but I hope you like it :D. Unfortunately I couldn't make the game in the time they gave me (3 hours), but I know it technically is optional, so that's why I submited anyways.

This game is about a thieve who is trying to scaoe form the police but Reality™ just recently had an update. However, the update was really bad and therefore everything got super buggy, thigs were glitching, no-clipping, time is resetting over and over... What a mess.

NOTE: Sorry I didn't upload an html build. Hope I can do that next time!
